reviews.review: “OUT OF THE BOX is a literary car crash that you can’t turn away from, but happily, one in which the victims walk away, scarred but intact.” - The Guardian

“Ms. Dudley’s voice and tone are lovely, unadorned, genuine and vulnerable. I welcome the process of revisiting darkness and pain for the dual purpose of wrestling old demons and also helping lead others out of their own dark nights of the soul. I have no doubt that her story, so beautifully and authentically rendered, will inspire, soothe, and accompany others as they rebuild lives shattered by abuse.” - KIRKUS
“Christina’s barebones honesty gripped me from her first words.”  - The New York Times
